Swimming at the 1997 European Aquatics Championships – Men's 4 × 100 metre medley relay
1997 FINA Short Course World Championships – Men's 4 × 100 metre medley relay

response: Affiliated with swimming club Rochdale Aquabears, Maden won the bronze medal in the men's 4×100-metre medley relay at the 1997 FINA Short Course World Championships, alongside Martin Harris (backstroke), James Hickman (butterfly) and Mark Foster (freestyle).
